comment._content: Thanks!  We also found some information in the New York Times Archive about the event at the end of Sept. 1911.  We'll add date and state information to the source data and reload the description.

comment.author: 40308400@N02
comment._content: I just found out recently that my great-great uncle was one of the 78 who died in this awful flood. It was a story I had never heard. It is very tragic to see these photos and know that so many lives were lost.
